1.12.2.2.0.0:
FEATURE EXPANSION includes:
 • Teleport Beacons can now be set to teleport (Sneak+Right-Click with a wand to cycle destination)
 • new Bow of Teleportation item, has advantage of storing its teleport destination independently from your wand list (Sneak+Right-Click to set)
 • new Teleport Rail block teleports minecarts
 • an extended range splash potion
 • new wand features (Sneak+Left-Click and Sneak+Right-Click improvements - see tool tips)
 • improved handling for setting a teleport destination on a dispenser (cycles with each Sneak+Right-Click)
 • 6 new mod console commands
 • 18 new mod config options
